articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Tried to rush Bumrah three times': Shastri's no-nonsense take on injured duo - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ravi Shastri has said that he wouldn't want to see two of India's star players in the Asia Cup. | Cricket
articles.content: India have missed out on the services of some of their biggest stars due to injuries in the last few months. Most of them, though, seem to be on their way back. Fast bowler Jasprit Bumrah is set to p… [+2402 chars]
